#summary GWT Rich Text Widget - Getting Started
#labels Featured

= Installation =

Installation steps:
  # Download the latest JAR file
  # add the downloaded JAR file to classpath of the GWT Compiler/Shell
  # add: <inherits name='com.jpavel.gwt.wysiwyg.Editor'/> to your module descriptor XML file

= Sample Code =

{{{
  HorizontalPanel hzContainer = new HorizontalPanel();

  Editor editor = new Editor();
  editor.setWidth("100%");
  editor.setHeight("300px");

  hzContainer.add(editor);

  editor.load();

  editor.addLoadListener(new LoadListener() {
     public void onLoad(Widget sender) {
        editor.setHTML("<h1>Hello World!</h1>");
     }

     public void onError(Widget sender) {
     }
  });
}}}

*Note*: at the moment editor.setHTML() can only be called from the LoadListener.
